title: Should I start a tech startup in Silicon Valley or Shenzhen? - Quora

response.answer_text: I am assuming that you have the wealth and network basis for both options based on how you . With that in mind it depends on what resources you lack and what you want out of your tech company. A US company has specific protections and case law that make it appealing for investors. If you have manufacturing, or sourcing ties in Shenzhen it is not very difficult to fill in the production gaps assuming your product is physical in nature. Specific design talent is available in the US, but development cost in labor and materials is going to favor China. You will have IP risk in China and some political risk, but depending on what your tech startup is and how well connected you are these risks might be diminished. So without knowing more that is the extent of information that I can provide.
